======
README
======

Let's test the source code with our custom checker:

  >>> from __future__ import unicode_literals
  >>> import p01.checker
  >>> import j01.dialog
  >>> skipFolderNames = [
  ...     'img',
  ...     'test',
  ... ]

  >>> checker = p01.checker.Checker()
  >>> checker.check(j01.dialog, skipFolderNames=skipFolderNames)
